careers.title: Mechanical Engineer
careers.description: Design and develop mechanical systems, engines, and thermal equipment.
pathway: Complete Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering
Gain internship experience in automotive or aerospace
Specialize in thermal systems or HVAC

careers.title: Energy Analyst
careers.description: Analyze energy consumption patterns and optimize energy systems.
pathway: Bachelor's in Engineering, Physics, or related field
Gain experience with renewable energy systems

careers.title: HVAC Engineer
careers.description: Design heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.
pathway: Gain hands-on experience with HVAC contractors

careers.title: Power Plant Engineer
careers.description: Operate and maintain power generation equipment and systems.
pathway: Bachelor's in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
Gain experience in utilities or power generation

careers.title: Research Scientist
careers.description: Conduct research on advanced thermodynamic systems and materials.
pathway: Complete Master's degree with research focus
Pursue PhD in thermodynamics or related field
Publish research and build academic network

careers.title: Process Engineer
careers.description: Optimize industrial processes involving heat and mass transfer.

careers.title: Materials Scientist
careers.description: Research and develop new materials with specific properties.
pathway: Bachelor's in Materials Science or Chemistry

careers.title: Semiconductor Engineer
careers.description: Design and manufacture semiconductor devices and circuits.
pathway: Bachelor's in Electrical or Materials Engineering
